text:
Hi,
there seems to be a bug in the implementation of JAXP.
In Verion 1.2.2 of XercesJ, the Methods "parse (InputStream, DefaultHandler)" 
etc. exist, but in Version 1.2.3, 1.3 and 2.0, there are only the Methods with 
second Parameter = HandlerBase.

According to the Sun JAXP-Specification, the Methods "parse (InputStream, 
DefaultHandler)" must exist.
creator: fstengel@metris.de
edwingo@apache.org
text:
Hmmm, the code shows that all the methods are there, so I am closing
this bug.
